import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Layout, Card, Row, Col, Statistic, Typography, Spin, Alert, Tabs, Tag, Progress } from 'antd'; import { TrophyOutlined, BarChartOutlined, PieChartOutlined, LineChartOutlined, DatabaseOutlined, RobotOutlined, BulbOutlined, StarOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; import { BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, Legend, ResponsiveContainer, PieChart, Pie, Cell, LineChart, Line, ScatterChart, Scatter } from 'recharts'; const { Header, Content } = Layout; const { Title, Text } = Typography; const { TabPane } = Tabs; // Datos del an√°lisis (simulados - en producci√≥n vendr√≠an de una API) const analysisData = { dataset: { totalArticles: 1571, newspapers: 13, categories: 46, importantArticles: 404, importantPercentage: 25.7 }, models: [ { name: 'LightGBM', accuracy: 96.51, auc: 99.21, rank: 1, isBest: true }, { name: 'Random Forest', accuracy: 96.83, auc: 98.11, rank: 2 }, { name: 'Regresi√≥n Log√≠stica', accuracy: 93.97, auc: 97.85, rank: 3 }, { name: 'Naive Bayes', accuracy: 93.97, auc: 96.71, rank: 4 }, { name: 'KNN', accuracy: 90.48, auc: 93.89, rank: 5 }, { name: '√Årbol de Decisi√≥n', accuracy: 92.70, auc: 89.84, rank: 6 } ], features: [ { name: '09 2025', importance: 9.53 }, { name: '09', importance: 8.92 }, { name: '2025', importance: 5.67 }, { name: 'periodico_encoded', importance: 5.44 }, { name: 'actualizado', importance: 2.97 }, { name: '06', importance: 2.90 }, { name: '14 09', importance: 2.40 }, { name: '14', importance: 2.39 }, { name: '00', importance: 2.03 }, { name: '06 00', importance: 1.69 } ], clustering: { clusters: 5, inertia: 1190976.68, labels: [4, 0, 4, 4, 0, 3, 0, 2, 0, 4] }, temporal: { days: 2, averageProportion: 33.2, range: { min: 15.0, max: 51.3 } } }; const COLORS = ['#0088FE', '#00C49F', '#FFBB28', '#FF8042', '#8884D8', '#82CA9D']; function App() { const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('overview'); useEffect(() => { // Simular carga de datos setTimeout(() => { setLoading(false); }, 2000); }, []); if (loading) { return (
Cargando an√°lisis de miner√≠a de datos...
); } const bestModel = analysisData.models.find(model => model.isBest); return (

Resumen} key="overview"> Modelos} key="models"> Caracter√≠sticas} key="features"> Clustering} key="clustering"> Insights} key="insights">
); } function OverviewTab({ data, bestModel }) { return (

); } function ModelsTab({ models }) { return (

))}

); } function FeaturesTab({ features }) { return (
Top 10 Caracter√≠sticas M√°s Importantes
{features.map((feature, index) => (
{index + 1}. {feature.name} {feature.importance}%
))}
Distribuci√≥n de Importancia Top 5 Caracter√≠sticas `${name}: ${importance}%`} outerRadius={80} fill="#8884d8" dataKey="importance" > {features.slice(0, 5).map((entry, index) => ( ))}
); } function ClusteringTab({ clustering }) { const clusterData = clustering.labels.map((label, index) => ({ x: index, y: label, cluster: `Cluster ${label}` })); return (
} valueStyle={{ color: '#1890ff' }} /> } valueStyle={{ color: '#52c41a' }} /> } valueStyle={{ color: '#faad14' }} /> Distribuci√≥n de Clusters Conteo por Cluster
{Array.from({ length: clustering.clusters }, (_, i) => { const count = clustering.labels.filter(label => label === i).length; return (
Cluster {i} {count} art√≠culos
); })}
); } function InsightsTab({ data, bestModel }) { const insights = [ `El modelo ${bestModel.name} es el m√°s efectivo para clasificar art√≠culos con un ${bestModel.accuracy}% de precisi√≥n`, "Las caracter√≠sticas de texto son las m√°s importantes para la clasificaci√≥n", "El clustering revela 5 patrones distintos en la estructura de los art√≠culos", "Las fechas y per√≠odos temporales son caracter√≠sticas clave para identificar art√≠culos importantes" ]; const recommendations = [ "Usar LightGBM para clasificaci√≥n autom√°tica de nuevos art√≠culos", "Implementar an√°lisis de sentimiento en el contenido textual", "Monitorear tendencias temporales de importancia de noticias", "Considerar features adicionales como hora de publicaci√≥n y autor", "Expandir el an√°lisis temporal con m√°s datos hist√≥ricos", "Implementar un sistema de alertas para art√≠culos importantes" ]; return (
